Author: gkelleyr
Text: Same thing happened to me. Now I can’t jump start restriction for more than two days without binging. I think because u were adequately fueled for decades the first round of restriction is buys. Then ur body knows what’s about to happen and fights it like the plague

Author: biobitch535
Text: Youre not a failure, you needed a break. Ive been at the same weight since January and im pretty upset about it too.. I would easily be around my goal weight right now. Try not to focus on the past and look to the future
